name: Sound Forge Pro Project
summary: An FRG file is an audio project created by MAGIX Sound Forge Pro, a digital audio editing program for Windows. It contains a multi-track project, which includes references to imported audio files and editing information, such as EQ , fades, reverb, distortion, and delay. The FRG file type is Sound Forge Pro's primary format.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: FRG file open in MAGIX Sound Forge Pro 17
